item.description:
Please RSVP!

This meeting features a special presentation by B.I.G. member Rich Mandel on Dividend Capture strategies 

Interactive Market Discussion

We will harness the intellectual horsepower of our members to figure out where the market is going.

Stock Picks / Trade Ideas

We will analyze members ideas for stocks to trade and how to trade them.

Dividend Capture Strategies

Member Rich Mandel will present some alternatives for using dividend capture as a trading (rather than investing) strategy - and back his ideas up with back testing.

 

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google.com/bostonibd

If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you!

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone.

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.

 You pick the topic and we will discuss it en groupe.
item.name: Boston Investor's Group Wednesday Meetup
